mapper.select: select CCODE, CNAME, CURL, CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH, CUSEYN from CATEGORY where CSEQ is null and CDEPTH is null order by CPARENT asc
select CCODE, CNAME, CURL, CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH, CUSEYN from CATEGORY where CPARENT = #{parent} and CSEQ is not null and CDEPTH is null order by CPARENT, CSEQ asc
select CCODE, CNAME, CURL, CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH, CUSEYN from CATEGORY where CPARENT = #{parent} and CSEQ = #{seq} and CDEPTH is not null order by CPARENT asc
select CCODE, CNAME, CURL, CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH, CUSEYN from CATEGORY where CPARENT = #{parent} and CSEQ = #{seq} and CDEPTH = #{depth} order by CPARENT asc
